introUp:
Hello! I'm Olivier Trudeau, 
 a passionate front-end developer
introDown: I believe in the importance of always learning. I thrive on challenges and love turning creative concepts into living, interactive experiences. When I'm not immersed in coding, I enjoy exploring new places through travel, building new things, and even trying my hand at chess, though I admit I could use some practice.
clickHere: click here to see my project
emailText: I am currently exploring new opportunities, and if my work aligns with your interests, I would love to schedule a Zoom meeting to discuss potential collaborations over a cup of tea.
